meta.description: No matter what's the origin of COVID-19, the response to this virus lead to a series of drastic and unprecedented changes on a global level. The dystopian future is now. Here's how this pandemic created the largest human experiment in history.

title: COVID-19 Lockdown: A Global Human Experiment
cleaned_text: The response to the COVID-19 pandemic launched the largest human experiment in world history. At the moment of writing these lines, over a third of the global human population is forced into confinement. Furthermore, the global economy came to a scre
